title: Online Teacher Development Program: Strengthening Science Education Leadership Based on Experiential Learning and Communities of Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A customized faculty development program for science field university administrators/leaders conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. It emphasizes practical competency enhancement through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can design online teaching strategies for science education innovation following the experiential learning model (Kolb Cycle).
Learners can build and operate virtual collaborative learning environments by applying the Community of Inquiry framework (Garrison Model).
Learners can develop science education content and conduct peer reviews in a smartphone-based LMS environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
